mapper.sql: id, instance_id, extra1, extra2, extra3, extra4, extra5, `status`, created_time, created_by, updated_time, updated_by, report_org, report_person, report_phone, side_flag, finance_flag, urgent_flag, org_flag, event_title, event_info, system_name, complain_flag, event_source, event_status, event_status_reason, init_first_level, init_second_level, init_three_level, inf_level, event_priority, target_resolve_date, assigned_group, assigned_person, second_solve_plan, solve_plan, event_reason_category, event_source_system, relational_system, event_category, event_subclass, event_entry, event_subentry1, event_subentry2, final_first_level, final_second_level, final_three_level, change_flag, change_no, inf_face, inf_use, inf_system, inf_time_range, second_deal_org, second_deal_person, solution_valid_flag, close_code, event_level, files
mapper.select: select g.groupid from og_group g left join og_group_person o on g.groupid = o.groupid left join og_person p on o.pid = p.pid where 1 = 1 AND p.pid = #{userId} union select distinct r.rid from og_role r left join OG_R_POST_ROLE pr on r.rid = pr.rid left join og_post p on p.postid = pr.postid left join og_r_user_post u on p.postid = u.postid WHERE u.userid = #{userId} union select o.orgid from og_person p left join OG_ORG o on p.orgid = o.orgid where p.pid = #{userId}

SELECT a.*, b.submit_time, b.solve_time, b.solve_person, b.solve_org, b.solve_group, b.close_time, b.suspend_flag, b.suspend_time, b.urge_flag, b.urge_time, b.service_back_falg, b.add_msg_back_falg, b.cancel_falg, b.cancel_time, b.back_completion_flag FROM design_biz_incident a LEFT JOIN incident_sub_event b ON a.extra1 = b.event_no
a.created_by = #{createBy}

SELECT a.*, b.submit_time, b.solve_time, b.solve_person, b.solve_org, b.solve_group, b.close_time, b.suspend_flag, b.suspend_time, b.urge_flag, b.urge_time, b.service_back_falg, b.add_msg_back_falg, b.cancel_falg, b.cancel_time, b.back_completion_flag, (CASE WHEN A.event_priority is NULL THEN 'P9' ELSE A.event_priority END) AS PLEVEL FROM design_biz_incident a LEFT JOIN incident_sub_event b ON a.extra1 = b.event_no
a.extra5 = #{todoPersonal}
a.extra5 IS NOT NULL AND a.extra5 != ''
order by PLEVEL,a.created_time desc

SELECT a.*, b.submit_time, b.solve_time, b.solve_person, b.solve_org, b.solve_group, b.close_time, b.suspend_flag, b.suspend_time, b.urge_flag, b.urge_time, b.service_back_falg, b.add_msg_back_falg, b.cancel_falg, b.cancel_time, b.back_completion_flag FROM design_biz_incident a LEFT JOIN incident_sub_event b ON a.extra1 = b.event_no WHERE a.extra5 IN ( SELECT pp.pid FROM og_group_person pp WHERE pp.groupid IN ( SELECT o.groupid FROM og_group_person o LEFT JOIN og_person p ON o.pid = p.pid WHERE p.pid = #{userId} ) AND pp.pid != #{userId} ) AND a.instance_id IS NOT NULL order by a.created_time desc
